greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the number of factorizations of n into factorial numbers larger than one; a(1) = 1.
comment: Values 1..7 occur for the first time at n = 1, 24, 576, 13824, 69120, 414720, 1658880.
In range 1..69120 differs from A034876 only at positions n = 1, 2, 9, 10 and 16.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..69120
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
program: (PARI) A322583(n, m=n) = if(1==n, 1, my(s=0); for(i=2, oo, my(f=i!); if(f>m, return(s)); if(!(n%f), s += A322583(n/f, f))));
xref: Cf. A000142, A001013 (positions of nonzero terms), A009968, A034876, A034968.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 25 2018
